document.full_text: former secretary of state warren christopher, who helped bring peace to bosnia and negotiated the release of american hostages in iran, died in california at age 85.
document.title: warren christopher, u.s. negotiator, dies at 85
lines_and_colors: former secretary of state warren christopher, who helped bring peace to bosnia and negotiated the release of american hostages in iran, died in california at age 85.
